p: Total RNA was extracted from plasma samples using the RNeasy Mini Kit (QIAGEN, Hilden, Germany). cDNA was synthesized using Reverse Transcription System (Promega, Madison, WI, USA). Nested-PCR first amplification primers (5’-CCATCTGGTACATGTGG-3’ and 5’-CATGTCCTCAGTRGTCATCC-3’); second amplification primers (5’-GTGGAGATGACTGCGTTGTGAAGCC-3’ and 5’-CCA TCAGTCGAAGGTCTCTTCTGTGG-3’) [ 18].
